text: Roland Morris "Fatty" Taylor (March 13, 1946 â€“ December 7, 2017) was an American professional basketball player. He was born in Washington, D.C.. He played for the Virginia Squires from 1969 through 1974 and again from 1975 through 1976. He also played for the Denver Nuggets from 1974 through 1975 and again from 1976 through 1977. Taylor died on December 7, 2017 at the age of 71 from male breast cancer in Denver, Colorado.Former Nugget Roland 'Fatty' Taylor Passes Away at 71 ==References== ==Other websites== *Career stats Category:1946 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from male breast cancer Category:Denver Nuggets players Category:Sportspeople from Washington, D.C.
title: Roland Taylor
